mapper.update: update t_Activity_Rank set FLastScore = FTotalSCore, FLastModifyTime = now(), FTotalSCore = FTotalSCore + #{score, jdbcType = INTEGER}, FMaxQuestionCode = #{maxQuestionCode, jdbcType = INTEGER}, where FID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ( @rowNum := @rowNum + 1 ) rank, ID, totalSCore,userID,lastScore,activity,seasonID,season,userName FROM ( SELECT t.FID ID, t.FTotalSCore totalSCore, FUserID userID, FLastScore lastScore, FActivityID activity, FSeasonID seasonID, FSeason season, FUserName userName, ( SELECT count( 1 ) num FROM t_Activity_JoinRecord t2 WHERE t2.FUserID = userID ) AS sortC FROM t_Activity_Rank t WHERE t.FActivityID = #{activityID,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.FSeasonID = #{seasonID, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t.FIsDelete = 0 ORDER BY t.FTotalSCore DESC, sortC ASC LIMIT 100 ) t3, ( SELECT ( @rowNum := 0 ) ) b
